entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 09:50 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
